# harness_platform_infra_provider (Resource)

Resource for managing Terraform/OpenTofu Providers in the IaCM Provider Registry.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "harness_platform_infra_provider" "aws" {
  type        = "aws"
  description = "AWS provider for IaCM"
}

resource "harness_platform_infra_provider" "azurerm" {
  type        = "azurerm"
  description = "Azure provider for IaCM"
}

resource "harness_platform_infra_provider" "google" {
  type        = "google"
  description = "Google Cloud provider for IaCM"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `type` (String) Provider type (e.g., aws, azurerm, google).

### Optional

- `description` (String) Description of the provider.

### Read-Only

- `account` (String) Account that owns the provider.
- `created` (Number) Timestamp when the provider was created.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier of the provider.
- `updated` (Number) Timestamp when the provider was last updated.
- `versions` (List of Object) List of provider versions. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--versions))

<a id="nestedatt--versions"></a>
### Nested Schema for `versions`

Read-Only:

- `files` (List of String) List of uploaded files for this version.
- `synced` (Boolean) Whether the version is synced.
- `version` (String) Version number.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import harness_platform_infra_provider.example <provider_id>
```
